Johnny Mnemonic.Action: Confidently assures his agent he can carry a big job despite its difficulty.
Acts casually and unbothered when entrusted with a high-stakes task.
Calmly reassures Ralf not to worry despite the dangerous situation.
Creates a path through a hostile mob with a benevolent expression, nods thanks to those who give way.
After escaping a protest, pauses to help a woman who fell and is panicked.
Blocks a police officer’s club swing with his briefcase, then uses a small spray device to incapacitate another cop quickly and efficiently.
Helps a woman who trips during the chaos, showing presence of mind amid disorder.
After incapacitating the cop, quickly looks around and then heads toward his objective, the tower, with focus and purpose.
Negotiates the acquisition of a technical device (a Pemex doubler), despite knowing it is subpar; accepts it as the best available option.
Expresses disgust and anger when the man cannot fully vet the device, but still proceeds.
Waves playfully to a child across a distorted fishbowl, who beams in response.
Suddenly stops playful behavior and moves on quickly without further interaction.
Ignores the Koreans, steps around one as if she’s furniture.
Waves smoke away with his hand, adjusts the environment calmly.
Comments skeptically on the clients, saying they look like 'missionaries' instead of players.
Listens carefully and makes a snap decision despite the dangerous upload warnings.
Double locks the door and sets a motion detector for security before the meeting.
Explains how to use the upload remote carefully and shares detailed instructions with Viet #1
Focuses intently on the technical aspects of the data transfer without engaging personally with others.
Double locks the door and sets up a motion detector to secure the room before proceeding.
Constructs the upload device quickly and skillfully from various seemingly unrelated materials, including integrating fine gold cables into his glasses and ear jack.
Hands over a sophisticated upload remote with multiple functions and explains it clearly to Viet #1, showing detailed technical knowledge and confidence.
Acknowledges the excessive data size (320 gigabytes) without hesitation or concern, focusing on task completion.
Complies with a risky upload task despite knowing it may cost him dearly; shows physical discomfort but persists.
Conceals unsteadiness and injury, continues to move despite pain.
Removes gold cables and stuffs them in his pocket, acting on automatic pilot without interaction with others.
Removes his glasses and gold cables, moves as if on automatic pilot despite being unsteady and bleeding from the nose; conceals his physical weakness and keeps going.
Sags and appears white-faced behind glasses after barrage, indicating physical or mental strain.
Attempts to stabilize himself through meditative exercise, breathes slowly until shaking stops, indicating self-care and composure.
Reacts to the solemn stare of a young child with visible inner concern, putting a hand against the wall to support himself, showing emotional sensitivity.
Attempts to stabilize himself using a meditative exercise when shaking, showing self-control and focus.
Carefully checks security devices such as motion detectors and door LEDs and responds by killing the light and stepping back quietly.
Pauses and supports himself against the wall when suddenly struck emotionally, indicating a momentary vulnerability.
Slams the bathroom door closed quickly to avoid danger and prevents pursuers from following immediately.
Snatches the fax paper just as the lethal filament cuts through it, securing the last remaining image despite extreme danger.
Dives for the door and escapes under heavy fire, showing quick reflexes and situational awareness.
Successfully convinces Customs Officer with government-approved card, avoiding suspicion despite initial alarm about implant discharge.
Does not address or fix the issue of the implant discharging and seepage immediately.
Acknowledges being overloaded with information but still continues with his task, showing awareness of his limits and the challenges he faces.
Talks on an antique phone while switching roles back from salesman to original self, suggesting adaptability and multitasking skills.
Mentions an upgrade briefly but provides no detailed insight, which may imply some uncertainty or lack of full confidence about his capabilities after the upgrade.
Agrees to meet Ralf for a drink after a difficult mission, showing willingness to maintain social connection.
Shows frustration and worry alone but does not share feelings openly, indicating emotional reservation.
Communicates cautiously and questions unclear information, showing awareness of potential risks.
Expresses frustration and worry about the data and situation, indicating some internal doubt but does not freeze or give up.
Decides to check out the place despite feeling overloaded and uncertain, demonstrating willingness to act and take responsibility.
Toad, a young Lotek, smiles indulgently and lets Johnny pass; Johnny squats next to Toad and proceeds calmly during tense moments.
Headbutts and throws Laslo violently after Laslo blocks his way and lies.
Uses a waterlogged two-by-four to knock down Henson before he can shoot.
Snaps off the laser sight and silencer from Henson's gun, tossing them into a puddle, making the weapon less stealthy but keeping a functional pistol.
Skirts the building cautiously, removes motion detector to avoid detection.
Bends to look through door crack, but door opens quickly, surprising him and putting him at a disadvantage.
Hides in rubble and improvises by picking up a length of steel bar as a weapon.
Strikes down an enemy (Henson) with a makeshift weapon, effectively neutralizing a threat.
Quickly adapts by picking up an enemy's gun, removing attachments to streamline the weapon.
Watches the violent scene from hiding, does not intervene to help others or stop the violence.
Observes others risking their safety (J-Bone running back disregarding his own safety) but remains passive.
Watches from hiding, does not intervene directly during violence.
Remains cautious and observant in dangerous situation, evaluates potential threats.
Does not take initiative to act or influence events when opportunity arises.
Remains calm despite being restrained.
Shows dawning understanding of complex situation (the cryo-unit and information decay).
Attempts to negotiate and find a way to work things out.
Jumps the table and heaves the filament weapon at Shinji to protect Jane.
Moves Ralf over next to Shinji with a gesture of the looks back nervously.
Dives for the pistol and holds it on Shinji, demonstrating protective alertness.
Looks back to check on Pretty as they run through the alleys, showing some concern.
Dives for the pistol and holds it on Shinji, takes initiative to arm himself quickly in a tense situation.
Looks back nervously while moving others into position, showing awareness but also some hesitation under pressure.
Fires a burst at pursuing enemy but ends up empty (CLICK), indicating misfire or lack of ammunition, showing a momentary lapse or limitation.
Reacts to dangerous situations by running and following Jane's lead into the alleys, showing situational awareness and adaptability.
Quickly follows Jane through the hidden exit and scrambles down into the manhole to evade pursuers.
Relies on Jane to find and open an escape route rather than finding it himself.
Performs a meditative exercise to regain control over intense pain rather than showing frustration or anger.
Not interested in conversation, withdrawing when in pain.
Performs a meditative exercise he learned to control severe head pain, regaining composure and continuing on.
Stumbles and clutches his head in pain, nearly doubled over, showing vulnerability to physical weakness.
Tries to negotiate payment and asks for help despite his pain and vulnerability.
Keeps information to himself about being a smuggler and the difficulty with the data he carries.
Appears closed off and not interested in conversation even while suffering.
Struggles physically and mentally, stumbles and goes down on his knees, talks about needing help and not knowing how to handle the data.
Acknowledges technical capability of carrying nearly eighty gigs of data in a sixty using a doubler, showing technical knowledge.
Appears confused and overwhelmed, unable to resolve immediate crisis or secure payment promptly.
Maintains composure and focus amid tension and danger; continues to pursue the issue at hand calmly.
No explicit demonstration of skill or action in this excerpt; mostly observing and reacting.
Looks at Jane when she asks about his parents, then shrugs and says he doesn't think about it.
Deflects sensitive question about what he thinks about when alone and speeds up his pace to end conversation.
Takes Hooky’s elbow and guides his prosthetic into the unknown (helping/leading).
Crosses table and places cryo-unit on it deliberately, showing awareness of the environment and task setup.
Deflects sensitive questions to avoid emotional distraction, maintaining focus on mission.
Shrugs off personal connections and avoids emotional considerations, possibly indicating detachment that helps maintain task focus.
Speeds up his pace and stops talking when prompted, indicating decisiveness and urgency.
Exhibits signs of glitches and mental distractions ('weird glitch', not remembering), which may negatively impact reliability.
Skillfully sets up and uses advanced computer equipment including goggles and gloves to navigate and manipulate a complex virtual reality data environment.
Performs 'breaking and entering' into a secure data system, indicating technical skill and confidence in hacking.
Adroitly manipulating nonphysical objects with gloved hands, as serious as disarming a bomb.
Making a long-distance call and navigating multiple virtual screens to track down information accurately.
Using online translation and persistence to locate a partial piece of data in a copy shop's fax modem buffer.
Bluffs Strike by threatening to crash his board to get information.
Appears concerned about the virus affecting Strike and wants to help him escape.
Bluffs Strike by threatening to crash his board and wipe out data, showing confidence and tactical thinking.
Tries to find information about the Pharmakom data and Dr. Allcome by navigating cyberspace despite horror and danger.
Fails to prevent Strike from being attacked by a virus that erases his image and data.
Allows Jane to use his phone card without hesitation.
Grins and jokes with Jane about their first date despite the danger.
Quickly grabs a carton (INFO 3000) from the stock shelf amid an attack, showing presence of mind and adaptability.
Pulls a phone-card from a pile and promptly uses it to escape through the service alley, demonstrating resourcefulness and quick thinking.
Letting Jane toss a grenade and then being pulled out by her, indicating reliance on others in critical moments rather than handling the threat himself.
Remarks humorously ('A beer opener?!') after slipping Jane's card into the Autobahn clip, showing casual confidence.
Jane picks coffees and carries them over to Johnny, showing a friendly gesture.
Pays no mind to the wounded or dead men around him, eyes burning with fury.
Convincing a corporate contact to negotiate despite the danger, attempting to resolve situation pragmatically.
Works Infobahn keypad like an ace, hacks into Pharmakom Industries' unlisted number successfully.
Sorts through thick deck of credit cards trying to find one to use, but Jane warns Yakuza is watching, suggesting difficulty and risk in proceeding.
Calmly continues to negotiate with Pharmakom representative despite tense circumstances, showing confidence and calculated approach.
Looks back and notices someone's poor condition, instinctively assumes responsibility and tries to help despite the danger.
Walks on as if not having seen someone in distress, panicking and unable to find help from others.
Drags and carries Jane out of a cab when she is strung out and clearly unwell.
Maintains calm and tries to bargain for data exchange despite the threat to his life.
Instinctively assumes responsibility for the person sinking to the ground but panics and looks around helplessly.
Walks on as if not having seen the person needing help, showing emotional detachment or avoidance.
Walks fast trying to outdistance a threatening presence, demonstrating situational awareness and escape strategy.
Carries an injured Jane and helps Spider carry her to surgical table, staying focused on her critical condition.
Impatiently presses intercom button but tries to get help quickly for Jane despite stress.
Focuses on his meeting, seems conflicted and furious at having to deal with Jane's emergency, showing some emotional detachment.
Quickly presses intercom button and calls for help despite stressful situation.
Manages to wedge wallet between patient's teeth to prevent choking.
Scrambles to pick up credit cards after wallet spills out, but does so quickly and continues assisting.
Struggles to handle Jane's convulsing condition but stays focused and determined to help her and get aid.
Says 'I can't deal with this now, understand?' showing some difficulty processing the crisis calmly.
Is at war with himself and furious, showing inner turmoil which slightly hinders confidence.
Helps Spider carry Jane to the surgical table and focuses fully on Jane's condition, assisting actively.
Turns away and winces at the sharp instrument Spider picks up, showing discomfort with harm to Jane.
Silently makes a phone call while Spider is distracted, without explanation or communication.
Does not answer Spider's sarcastic question about being a new boyfriend, remains silent, possibly indicating avoidant or guarded behavior.
Spooked and pulls back abruptly on seeing the image of Anna on the computer screen, showing vulnerability or internal turmoil.
Helps Spider carry Jane to the surgical table and assists with electrodes and monitoring; shows attentiveness and quick response in a medical emergency.
Turns away when Spider picks up a sharp instrument, indicating avoidance or discomfort in a critical situation.
Distractedly punches a phone number into a futuristic computer setup during a tense moment, showing initiative but also possible impulsiveness.
Avoids answering Spider’s question and withdraws when an image of Anna suddenly appears, showing signs of hesitation or internal conflict.
Despite confusion and being spooked by hallucinations, continues to stay engaged in the chaotic environment.
Wincing as his head hurts from the implant, showing vulnerability.
Responds curtly and minimally when questioned by Spider, saying 'Just Johnny.. .'
Mentions having problems which might indicate a need for help, showing openness.
Notices the handset beeping and replaces it quickly
Keeps calm and answers Spider’s aggressive questioning with clear, controlled responses
Manages situation in Spider's garage cautiously by not touching anything and observing carefully
Wincing and showing physical discomfort from his neural implant
Stares attentively at the van and jumps out of the chair, eager to act.
Demonstrates concern and urgency, asking where to go and focusing on the mission despite chaos around.
Listens to Spider and Jane without interrupting or dismissing, showing patience and trust in their judgment.
Stares intently at the modified van and quickly jumps out of the chair, showing alertness and readiness to act.
Demands information quickly ('Just tell me where to go!'), demonstrating decisiveness in a stressful situation.
Seems reliant on Spider for navigation and protection, not taking immediate control of the situation.
Stares in horror at the suffering patients alongside Jane, showing empathy.
Passes by a nurse who smiles at him without ignoring her, suggesting acknowledgement and tolerance.
Stares in horror at the overcrowded hospital scene, seemingly unsure how to respond.
Passes by a nurse who smiles at him, but does not take notable initiative or action to help.
Follows Spider through the hospital without leading or directing; largely passive in this environment.
Johnny digests suspicious information and remains cautious instead of immediately trusting others.
Shows concern when Spider voices worry, indicating some empathy and attentiveness to others' feelings.
Expresses skepticism and distrust toward Spider and Jane, questioning why he should trust them given the danger he's in.
Considers the value of what he carries and the potential to save millions of lives despite personal risk.
Touches Jane on the shoulder in a tender, protective gesture.
Grabs Jane and pulls her away from danger, prioritizing her safety.
Breaks connection abruptly after sharing information with Takahashi, showing a pragmatic but cold side.
Touches Jane on the shoulder in a tender, protective gesture while continuing to move forward.
Grabs Jane and pulls her away from danger, prioritizing safety and quick escape.
Adjusts the dash-phone’s camera so Security can only see him, not Jane, showing tactical awareness and security consciousness.
Breaks the connection abruptly after conveying critical information to Takahashi despite potential repercussions, showing decisiveness and control.
Unwilling to sacrifice Spider immediately but still hurries forward when necessary, showing some hesitation in crisis situations.
Shrugs and speeds on when facing an unclear situation.
Stares at the blank screen, breathing deeply, then shrugs and speeds on.
Sees the falling VW catch fire and immediately dives, tackles Jane to protect her from the impact.
Notices danger quickly and reacts by diving over and tackling Jane to save her from an oncoming flaming vehicle.
Seems at a loss momentarily and senses others are withholding information, showing some uncertainty.
Accidentally kicks a tool kit causing it to fall out of sight.
Stares puzzled at the surreal spectacle of the dolphin and naval equipment, appearing uncertain.
Johnny hesitates and resists going to the chair for the procedure, showing caution and mistrust.
Johnny and Jane exchange looks; Jane smiles pleased at his decision, indicating a bond and mutual support.
Johnny begins to grin when hearing about broadcasting the data worldwide for free, showing a positive, perhaps altruistic reaction.
Hesitates and initially resists sitting in the chair for the risky procedure, showing caution.
Considers the risk but ultimately decides to proceed with the plan, demonstrating calculated decision-making and confidence.
Exchanges knowing looks with Jane, indicating awareness and understanding of the situation and his role in it.
Shows wariness toward J-Bone but follows through with the plan, reflecting cautious competence.
Produces crumpled tax and hands it to J-Bone, showing readiness to share necessary information.
Sits in the chair, prepares broadcast antennae, instructs others to clear the infrasound area, demonstrating leadership and technical knowledge.
Takes a deep breath, closes his eyes, gathers himself before action under pressure, showing calm and focus.
Goes suddenly rigid as the scanner’s infrasound effect hits him, indicating vulnerability or lack of full control under attack.
Remains alert during chaos, tries to perceive faint images and make sense of incomplete information on screens.
Sits defeated and preoccupied by his own condition despite ongoing threats and action around him.
He whirls and shoots as Jane moves, very fast. Misses and then finds cover behind a pile of junk.
Braces himself as Takahashi steps toward him with a sword glinting, showing readiness and presence of mind.
Backs up cautiously, brandishes a crowbar to defend himself; avoids direct aggression but prepares to protect.
Laughs crazily when hanging precariously and facing danger with Shinji, showing a moment of shared understanding.
Grins and aggressively pulls Shinji close, then repeatedly punches Shinji out of anger, showing disregard for Shinji's safety.
Exerts great effort and risks his own safety hanging on a girder to survive, but no conciliatory or friendly behavior toward Shinji is shown.
Grins confidently while in a precarious physical situation, uses one hand skillfully to grab Shinji's lapel and pull him over, then cuts the filament with quick precision.
Engages in a desperate physical altercation, showing rage and disregard for personal safety but manages tactical control to slice the filament and defeat an opponent.
Backs away from Street Preacher while leading him away from Jane, protecting her from harm.
Stares in horror and wonder as Takahashi dies, showing emotional response to others' pain.
Emerges trembling but remains alert to surroundings and reacts quickly when confronted by Street Preacher, backing away strategically and using available items to defend himself.
Despite trauma and horror from witnessing Takahashi's death and handling the image, he does not freeze but retains enough presence of mind to act defensively.
Barely blocks a knife attack with a piece of junk, struggles but remains engaged in the fight.
Is physically overpowered and hurled into a wall by Street Preacher.
Makes a last desperate attempt to stop the attacker despite pain and being at a disadvantage.
Shows emotional conflict regarding Anna's revelation and comforts Jane by saying 'I'm okay'
Turns to J-Bone with new determination to help and solve problem
Shows a new determination despite emotional conflict; acts decisively by instructing 'Hook me up' to scan an image from his head.
His hands tremble while scanning the image, indicating nervousness or lack of full control.
Shows visible hurt and disappointment when Anna's image fluctuates and fades, appearing like a bullied, neglected child.
Turns to Jane and reaches out to her for support before proceeding with the dangerous download.
Allows Jane to help put on the helmet and accepts help despite the risk and discomfort.
Proceeds with a painful neurological download to help others, showing self-sacrifice.
Shares the Pharmakom data with the world, making it belong to everybody now.
Turns his eyes away from Anna as she is being erased from the mainframe.
Successfully uploads and distributes critical Pharmakom data globally despite physical pain and near death.
Appears limp and nearly lifeless after the data upload, suggesting physical limits reached and vulnerability.
Momentary withdrawal and inability to directly confront Pharmakom's counterattack (erasing him from the mainframe).
Turns his eyes away from Anna, unable to meet her emotionally as she calls him her son.
Struggles to come to grips with his emotions, indicating vulnerability and internal conflict.
Does not respond to Anna’s plea, showing emotional withdrawal.
Reflects on his identity and insecurity with uncertainty ('I don't know, I guess I never did').
Adopts a crude appearance intentionally to mask his technical nature, indicating self-protectiveness rather than openness.
Checks himself carefully in a reflective surface to maintain a certain appearance to blend in and get close to Ralfi Face's table.
Takes painstaking effort to hand-load ammunition and build mechanisms himself to prepare for a dangerous encounter.
Mentions owing Ralfi Face a lot of money and having valuable data stashed in his head that he can't access, noting Ralfi has been scarce and not retrieved the data.

Turns twelve-gauge shells from brass stock on a lathe, loads them himself, digs up microfiche instructions, builds a lever-action press—all technically complex tasks completed by himself with confidence.
Rides the tube three stops past his destination and walks back to ensure an immaculate, deliberate procedure.
Checks his appearance carefully to pass as someone else and gain proximity to a target, showing social and situational awareness.
Aware of the dangerous nature of the venue and the guards, showing caution and assessment of risk.
Has a large quantity of sensitive data stored in his head with no conscious access and recognizes the need for a code phrase held by Ralfi, showing understanding of security and encryption protocols.
Eagerly asks if the other is a black belt and shares own credentials openly.
Conceals identity by using an alias and a gun in his gym bag.
Engages in guarded, suspicious behavior in a tense, dangerous environment.
Arranges a clandestine meeting posing as Edward Bax, a covert identity, indicating planning and ingenuity.
Displays confidence by disclosing possession of a concealed double twelve-gauge shotgun and demonstrates knowledge of its operation.
Attempts to bluff Ralf by adopting a false identity, which is immediately undermined when Ralf identifies the antique firearm, showing partial failure in deception.
Sarcastically refers to himself as a 'meatball' full of implants but shows awareness of danger.
Expresses guarded distrust toward Ralfi and Lewis, indicating skepticism rather than friendliness.
Hopes Lewis will act to help him despite the dangerous context, implying some trust placed on others.
Attempts to resist the neural disruptor by trying to move his finger but is unable to, indicating limited control when incapacitated.
Analyzes the situation quickly, understanding the source of the trouble involves Yakuza property and deduces the stakes involved.
Engages in sharp dialogue, correcting Ralf's terminology to show knowledge and confidence ('Fence' vs 'broker').
Never repeats scary stories about Squids to clients to avoid leaving evidence.
Remains quiet and observant while Lewis is injured, not intervening directly.
Introduces himself politely to Molly Millions and cooperates with her to take Mr. Face with them.
Responds calmly and without hostility in an intense negotiation situation.
Does not engage in teasing or mocking despite tension; remains straightforward.
Confidently raises his price to two million and holds a shotgun as leverage in negotiation.
Maintains composure and uses body language to assert dominance in a tense interaction.
No hesitation or confusion when introducing himself and taking charge of the situation.
Successfully ushers Ralf through the door unnoticed while Molly distracts others, showing awareness and quick response.
His hand convulses painfully from the gym bag's recoil, nearly breaking his wrist, suggesting physical vulnerability or lack of preparation for the force.
Observes details like the arcs of light and shadows, and processes what is happening without panic, indicating situational awareness and mental calm.
Does not intervene or protect Ralf from the sudden attack, showing possible limitations in immediate protective capabilities or ability to act under pressure.
Aware of the danger posed by Yakuza assassins and understands the need to hide in dangerous areas like Nighttown's Pit.
Has never spent much time in Nighttown and thus has limited local knowledge and contacts there.
Explains his technical knowledge patiently and clearly to Molly, including details about 'Squids' and security measures.
Holds professional pride in his work and maintains a calm demeanor amid a hostile environment.
Observes and describes the cyborg dolphin with a detached, almost clinical tone, showing little emotional response.
Mentions needing to take a junkie friend something as a precondition to meeting, showing a pragmatic acceptance rather than judgment or sympathy.
Feels anxious to go after seeing Jones' sad and ancient eye, showing some empathy.
Says 'Give it to him,' authorizing Molly to act, showing a sense of trust and cooperation.
Leaves Jones drifting in dark water after Molly injects him, indicating a lack of concern for Jones' welfare.
Recognizes the importance of the key and decides to retrieve it quickly, coordinating with Molly and Jones.
Feels sudden panic recalling that Jones is not a fish and can drown, showing momentary emotional overwhelm.
Commands Jones effectively during the light code sequence, demonstrating control and understanding of a complex situation.
Agrees to give the key to Molly without hesitation, showing decisiveness.
Checks the two recorders while cooperating with Molly and shows no impatience or hostility during the deal negotiation.
Does not intervene or comment during the terse and somewhat aggressive negotiation between Molly and the pirate, indicating a degree of passivity or detachment.
Checks the two recorders simultaneously, demonstrating familiarity and control over technical equipment.
Relies on Molly to interpret and verify information (the slip of paper), showing some dependence on others for analysis.
Sits and sings dead Ralf's stolen program for three hours.
Nurses an aching wrist but continues to climb ladders and ascend through difficult terrain.
Allows Molly to reassure him by letting her touch his shoulder, indicating comfort and acceptance of her warmth.
Declares to the Lo Tek that he is a friend of Molly, asserting his allegiance and trustworthiness toward her.
Responds with no enthusiasm when the character questions his status, showing some social reservation or guardedness.
Engages carefully with dangerous acquaintances, demonstrates awareness of threats such as being followed without a light, and asserts his position by clarifying relationships.
Relies on Molly's protection and intervention, showing a lack of independent assertiveness or direct action in the face of danger.
Squinted at the cigarette trademark and decided on the origin with a calm, observational tone.
Reads the environment and companions without much enthusiasm or engagement.
Expresses uncertainty and lack of comprehension about the data he is carrying, indicating a certain detachment but not malicious intent.
Shows concern about the violent consequences involving 'one dead Johnny from Memory Lane', indicating some level of empathy or awareness of human cost.
Endures physical pain and exhaustion silently, continuing his task despite personal discomfort.
Erases most of the program copy to leave just enough to identify it as authentic while inserting a message for transmission, showing strategic thinking and technical skill.
Admits to having no idea what the program contains and only memorizes it without comprehension.
Pushes forward despite physical pain and exhaustion, maintaining focus on the mission.
Held a useless shotgun under his jacket for comfort despite no shells.
Observed the Lo Teks with some curiosity and detachment, trying to understand the scene.
Carries a useless shotgun under his jacket for comfort despite no ammo left, showing awareness of danger and reliance on preparedness.
Acknowledges having no clear understanding of what is really going on or what is supposed to happen, highlighting confusion and lack of situational knowledge.
Recognizes and mentally links a situational memory with a previous encounter, showing mental acuity and memory recall under pressure.
Bows with a smile and carefully aligns sandals side by side before stepping on the bench.
Removes the tip from his thumb gracefully and throws it to Molly.
Cups hands over ears and kneels in vertigo of sound, showing sensitivity to chaos around him.
Shows stunned incomprehension and revulsion at what he is witnessing, indicating deep emotional response.
Takes deliberate fall to buy himself a few seconds of dignity and silence, suggesting self-sacrifice and control.
Lets Molly handle appearance changes with a local anesthetic and trusts her.
Visits Jones almost every night and considers them partners.
Reflects on own hollowness and decision to change his life.
Mentions making good money with partners and learning about former clients.
Adapts his appearance with Molly's help to avoid detection after a dangerous situation.
Establishes a partnership with Jones and Molly, improving his business and intelligence gathering.
Takes initiative to stay informed by visiting Jones regularly and using new technology effectively.
Uncertainty about whether the Yakuza received their message or will come after him, indicating incomplete control over the situation.
Expresses hope for future personal clarity and living with his own memories.
Spends time quietly smoking and observing surroundings, showing introspection and tolerance for solitude.
Is learning complex technical information with help and becoming highly knowledgeable.
Relies heavily on Jones's Squid to interpret data rather than fully independently.
